text: Joe L. Chasteen (June 8, 1925 - August 17, 2021) was an American politician. He was a member of the Wyoming House of Representatives as a Republican Party from 1973 until 1977. He was born in Platte County, Wyoming. Chasteen died on August 17, 2021 in Cheyenne, Wyoming at the age of 96. ==References== Category:1925 births Category:2021 deaths Category:State legislators of the United States Category:Politicians from Wyoming Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:Businesspeople from Wyoming
title: Joe Chasteen
